Bash(gh pr create --title "Core Implementation - Morning Motivation Quote Generator" --body "$(cat <<''EOF''
## Summary

Complete implementation of the Morning Motivation Quote Generator based on comprehensive research from 5 sub-agents. This PR delivers a production-ready single-file application with all planned features.

## What''s New

### Core Application (`index.html`)

A complete, self-contained HTML file (~12KB) with embedded CSS and JavaScript.

## Features Implemented

### 1. Modern Gradient Design âœ…
- **Design:** Modern Gradient (Design B from research)
- **Style:** Minimal, professional, contemporary
- **Colors:** Blue-purple gradient accent (#667eea to #764ba2)
- **Layout:** Clean white card, rounded corners, subtle shadow
- **Placement:** Bottom-right corner (as recommended by UX research)

### 2. API Integration âœ…
- **Primary API:** DummyJSON Quotes API
- **Endpoint:** `https://dummyjson.com/quotes/random`
- **Timeout:** 5-second protection
- **Fallback:** Automatic switch to local quotes on failure
- **Error Handling:** Graceful degradation, always shows a quote

### 3. Fallback Quote System âœ…
- **15 High-Quality Quotes** from CURATED_QUOTES.md
- **Themes:** Learning, growth, persistence, motivation
- **Copyright:** Public domain/fair use verified
- **Authors:** Leonardo da Vinci, Theodore Roosevelt, Winston Churchill, etc.

### 4. Timer & Interaction âœ…
- **Auto-Close:** 15 seconds (default, configurable in code)
- **Visual Progress:** Animated progress bar
- **Hover-to-Pause:** Timer pauses while hovering over quote
- **Resume:** Automatically resumes when mouse leaves
- **Manual Close:** X button in corner

### 5. Click-to-Search âœ…
- **Action:** Click quote text to search on Google
- **Behavior:** Opens in new tab
- **Purpose:** Allows users to explore quote source/context

### 6. Accessibility (WCAG 2.1 AA) âœ…
- **ARIA:** Complete labels, roles, and live regions
- **Keyboard Navigation:**
  - `Esc` - Close quote
  - `Enter/Space` - Search quote (when focused on quote text)
  - `Tab` - Navigate between elements
- **Screen Readers:** Status announcements, semantic HTML
- **Focus Indicators:** Visible focus outlines
- **Reduced Motion:** Respects `prefers-reduced-motion`
- **Color Contrast:** Meets WCAG AA standards

### 7. Animations âœ…
- **Entrance:** 400ms slide-in from right with fade
- **Exit:** 1800ms fade-out with slide
- **Smooth:** Hardware-accelerated transforms
- **Accessible:** Respects user motion preferences

### 8. Responsive Design âœ…
- **Mobile:** Full-width layout on small screens
- **Tablet:** Adapts gracefully
- **Desktop:** Bottom-right placement
- **Breakpoint:** 768px

## Technical Highlights

- **Zero Dependencies:** Pure HTML/CSS/JavaScript
- **Single File:** Easy to distribute and deploy
- **Fast Load:** ~12KB, loads in <1 second
- **Offline Support:** Works without internet (fallback quotes)
- **Browser Support:** Modern browsers (Chrome, Edge, Firefox, Safari)
- **Performance:** GPU-accelerated animations, optimized rendering

All features align with research findings:

- âœ… **PRD.md** - All P0 requirements met

- âœ… **Keyboard Navigation:** All shortcuts working
